title: Beth Fraser
body:
Welcome to my website! My name's Beth and I'm a student at CodeClan in Edinburgh. This is a place for me to test out what I've learned and show off my new skills in HTML and CSS.

I've been living in Edinburgh for two years, and love the city. I'm originally from Northumberland, just south of the border. I'm really enjoying coding so far - as well as HTML and CSS I've started on some simple Ruby. Click on the links above to find out more about my interests or to get in touch.
